text: Air Malta (stylized as airmalta) is the flag carrier airline of Malta, based in Luqa. It was founded on 31 March 1973. The main hub is at Malta International Airport. It goes to destinations in Europe, the Middle East and North Africa. ==Fleet== ===Current fleet=== , Air Malta operates the following aircraft: Air Malta Fleet Aircraft In Service Orders Passengers Notes J Y Total Airbus A320-200 3 -- 8 156 164 168 168 Airbus A320neo 4 -- 12 162 174 Total 7 -- ===Former fleet=== Air Malta used to operate the following aircraft: * Airbus A319-100 * Avro RJ70 * Boeing 720B * Boeing 737-200 * Boeing 737-300 * Boeing 737-400 == Gallery == 9H-AEK@LHR 03MAY13 (9269258898).jpg|An Air Malta Airbus A320-214 at London Heathrow Airport in 2013. 9H-NEO_(44187195050).jpg|An Air Malta Airbus A320neo at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol in 2018. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:1973 establishments in Europe Category:Airlines of Europe Category:Organizations based in Malta *[J]: Business *[Y]: Economy
title: Air Malta
